name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building and maintaining API-driven backend systems. Proficient in modern programming languages including **Golang** and **TypeScript**, with extensive knowledge in **Kafka** for messaging and stream processing, and proven capabilities in distributed systems design. Skilled in working with **MCP** to ensure high availability and performance. Additionally, I have a strong background in creating high-performing APIs and automation tools using **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. A history of delivering successful projects in high-stakes environments for prominent organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered robust **API** services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to enhance document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, improving process efficiency by **30%**.
Developed event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests, achieving a **95%** success rate in request handling.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, which streamlined cloud operations and reduced deployment times by **40%**.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring data flow met compliance standards with a **100%** on-time delivery rate.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to establish scalable, secure authentication systems, enhancing data protection measures.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges, maintain compliance, and oversee release strategies to facilitate smooth project execution.

• Engineered APIs utilizing **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **TypeScript** to develop robust backend systems for automated document workflows and seamless user onboarding.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery**, **Redis**, and **Kafka** to enable efficient asynchronous processing of financial transactions, improving throughput by **40%**.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services** with a focus on scalability, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, achieving seamless deployment cycles reduced by **30%**.
• Developed and maintained distributed systems for secure regulatory data exchange, leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, which automated data flow processes and increased efficiency by **25%**.
• Conducted security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access control.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, ensuring smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, leading to a successful release management process with a **95%** timely release rate.

• Designed and developed robust **API** services for trade execution and account tracking, utilizing **Golang** and **PostgreSQL** for enhanced trading operations, serving over **1000** transactions per minute.
• Engineered real-time data processing solutions leveraging **Kafka**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, ensuring delivery of up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions with less than **50ms** latency.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to effectively integrate frontend and backend systems via REST APIs and WebSocket channels, achieving seamless user experiences across multiple platforms.
• Ensured strict adherence to regulatory standards such as MiFID II and GDPR by implementing robust data security protocols and documentation.
• Executed comprehensive testing strategies using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, improving QA and CI processes which reduced deployment time by **30%**.
• Developed backend task management and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, increasing process optimization efficiency by over **40%**.
